1.brief: properly, to glitter from afar, i.e. to be eminent (as a superintendent, especially of the Temple services and its music); to be permanent
David, the youngest son of Jesse
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
to flee for protection; figuratively, to confide in
properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
to nod, i.e. waver; figuratively, to wander, flee, disappear; also (from shaking the head in sympathy), to console, deplore, or (from tossing the head in scorn) taunt
a mountain or range of hills (sometimes used figuratively)

2.brief: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person
to tread; by implication, to walk; also to string abow (by treading on it in bending)
a bow, forshooting (hence, figuratively, strength) or the iris

properly, to be erect (i.e. stand perpendicular); hence (causatively) to set up, in a great variety of applications, whether literal (establish, fix, prepare, apply), or figurative (appoint, render sure, proper or prosperous)
properly, a piercer, i.e. an arrow; by implication, a wound; figuratively, (of God) thunderbolt; the shaft of aspear
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
properly, an overhanging, i.e. (by implication) an excess, superiority, remainder; also a small rope (as hanging free)
properly, to flow as water (i.e. to rain); transitively, to lay or throw (especially an arrow, i.e. to shoot); figuratively, to point out (as if by aiming the finger), to teach
the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything

3.brief: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
a basis, i.e. (figuratively) political or moral support
to pull down or in pieces, break, destroy

properly, interrogative what? (including how? why? when?); but also exclamation, what! (including how!), or indefinitely what (including whatever, and even relatively, that which); often used with prefixes in various adverbial or conjunctive senses
to do or make (systematically and habitually), especially to practise

4.brief: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
a large public building, such as a palace or temple
a sacred place or thing; rarely abstract, sanctity
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)
properly, covered, i.e. a throne (as canopied)
an eye (literally or figuratively); by analogy, a fountain (as the eye of the landscape)
to gaze at; mentally to perceive, contemplate (with pleasure); specifically, to have avision of
an eyelash (as fluttering); figuratively, morning ray
to test (especially metals); generally and figuratively, to investigate
a son (as a builder of the family name), in the widest sense (of literal and figurative relationship, including grandson, subject, nation, quality or condition, etc., (like father or brother), etc.)
ruddy i.e. a human being (an individual or the species, mankind, etc.)

5.brief: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
to test (especially metals); generally and figuratively, to investigate
morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person
to have affection for (sexually or otherwise)
violence; by implication, wrong; by meton. unjust gain
properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)

6.brief: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person
a (metallic) sheet (as pounded thin); also a spring net (as spread out like a lamina)
properly, cypress-resin; by analogy, sulphur (as equally inflammable)

wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality; by extension, a region of the sky; by resemblance spirit, but only of a rational being (including its expression and functions)
a glow (of wind or anger); also a famine (as consuming)
an allotment (by courtesy, law or providence)
a cup (as a container), often figuratively, a lot (as if a potion); also some unclean bird, probably an owl (perhaps from the cup-like cavity of its eye)

7.brief: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
rightness (abstractly), subjectively (rectitude), objectively (justice), morally (virtue) or figuratively (prosperity)
to have affection for (sexually or otherwise)
to gaze at; mentally to perceive, contemplate (with pleasure); specifically, to have avision of
the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
